body:
I'm on holiday and really bored so ask me anything 

I haven't done one of these before but I might as well seeing as everyone is doing them.

I'll try and reply to all but no promises because the wifi is awful.

If I say something weird, it is probably the auto correct on my phone. ;)

title: HotAndCrunch [AMA]

replies.body:
Favourite map for each game mode?

favourite position?

favourite match?

opinions?
replies.body_tagged:
Favourite map for each game mode?

favourite position?

favourite match?

opinions?

replies.body:
Ctw: definitely Wahiz. It's my favourite because it is the only map I like defending on, and i like the gameplay a lot.
Dtm. Probably rendezvous 3.5 because it is one of the og tourney maps, and i will necker forget that league game against bc :)
TDM: Crossfire because it is a bow heavy map, and I like to think I play well in it :)
DTC: enoki definitely because of the lag free gameplay and the great memories from TOC

My favourite position is probably mid or sky because you don't rage from rushing or  defending and it is chill :)

Favourite match was the bc match in the league. I can't stop myself from watching it on YouTube :p

Really nice guy with a sexy northern accent. [insert northerner joke here]. Still one of the only Northerners I can understand, but on the whole a really nice guy who has been a great friend in my time back here and even before i left. Great leader of apollo and nice guy to talk to :) <3
replies.body_tagged:

Dtm. Probably rendezvous 3.5 because it is one of the og tourney maps, and i will necker forget that league game against bc :)
TDM: Crossfire because it is a bow heavy map, and I like to think I play well in it :)
DTC: enoki definitely because of the lag free gameplay and the great memories from TOC

My favourite position is probably mid or sky because you don't rage from rushing or  defending and it is chill :)

Favourite match was the bc match in the league. I can't stop myself from watching it on YouTube :p

Really nice guy with a sexy northern accent. [insert northerner joke here]. Still one of the only Northerners I can understand, but on the whole a really nice guy who has been a great friend in my time back here and even before i left. Great leader of apollo and nice guy to talk to :) <3

replies.body:
Heya Sparks! I think the first time I ever played with you in Apollo was when you were WildCards on Halcyon, not sure why we scrimmed on that map! :P
Did you know that this day in the year of 2012 the summer Olympics began in London?
Questions...

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on?
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus?
  4. Why?
  5. Worst injury you have had?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. Which of the four seasons do you most love? Or hate?
  8. What was your first impression of me?
Hope you're having a great summer and hope to see you playing next tourney! :D
Have a listen to this!

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
1. No. I'm wearing flip flops xD
2. Steam or food 
3. I don't really use either 
4. Cause i am so clever um yeah.
5. Some bastard killed me but luckily I respawned. XD
6. I usually listen to pop, something relaxing but also hype at the same time. Pretty much the music i put in my yt videos 
7. I like all seasons except autumn no one like autumn 'nuff said xD :P
8. Omg senior mod. XD but when we first played together (yes i remember the halcyon game) you came across as a really cool guy and good player. :)

reply_to.body: How do you feel to be back in Apollo?
reply_to.body_tagged: How do you feel to be back in Apollo?

replies.body:
I started playing again because I was bored, and every one in a while I would check apollo slack for nostalgia (don't ask xD) and they needed someone to sub on cause they were scrimming. I offered and then I realised that I had forgotten how fun it was.

Nice guy who posts a lot on the forums...  I mean like loads. But it's really nice to see you in game and I hope we can get to know each other better in mczoners. :)
